document_data.mainbody: '''Herald domain''' was a [[deity]] domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and other powers related to heraldry, namely languages, communication, and leading and inspiring others.{{cite book/Book of Exalted Deeds|87}}
document_data.Patrons:
<!-- {{ListDeitiesByDomain|{{PAGENAME}}}} -->
Only the [[celestial paragon]] [[Barachiel]] offered the Herald domain.
document_data.Powers: The cleric could easily improve their skill at intimidation, and their diplomatic and intimidation skills were boosted.
document_data.Spells: As they advanced, the priest could understand other languages with ''[[comprehend languages]]'' and later ''[[tongues]]''. They could captivate groups of people with ''[[enthrall]]'' and give them orders with ''[[greater command]]''. They could transmit messages with ''[[sending]]'' and even in a ''[[dream]]''. Finally, they could inspire awe with ''[[crown of glory]]'' and gain [[celestial]] qualities with ''[[aspect of the deity]]'' and its ''[[Greater aspect of the deity|greater]]'' form.
